mn129:2.4: ca kena naṃ → na tena naṃ (mr) | na naṃ (?)
mn129:3.7: saṃvijjanteva te → saṃvijjante te ca (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn129:22.6: ye vā panaññepi keci tiracchānagatā pāṇā asucismiṃ jāyanti asucismiṃ jīyanti asucismiṃ mīyanti → etthantare pāṭho pā1 potthake
mn129:24.7: Yadi pana → yadi nūna (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn129:27.4: ca, kena naṃ → na tena naṃ (mr) | na naṃ (?)
mn129:35.5: Svāgataṃ te, mahārāja → svāgataṃ mahārāja (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn129:35.8: bhavanti → ahesuṃ (s1-3, km, mr), anuyantā → anuyuttā (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn129:41.2: upayāpetabbaṃ upayāpetuṃ → upaṭ­ṭhāpetab­baṃ upaṭṭhāpetuṃ (bj, s1-3, km) | upaṭ­ṭhapetab­baṃ upaṭṭhapetuṃ (pts1)
mn129:46.3: Ekamekenapi, bhante, ratanena → tena bhante ratanena (bj, pts1)
